call_title: Opening Doors with Ergo | PandaV | Ergoversary 2025

commitments.commitment: More mobile app functions will be made in the next coming video, next enhancement
commitments.quote: More mobile app functions will be made in the next coming video, next enhancement.

commitments.commitment: Integrate database records and improve mobile app functions
commitments.quote: We'll integrate database records and improve mobile app functions.

commitments.commitment: Integrate with some more access products and hardware
commitments.quote: Integrate with some more access products and hardware.

key_facts.fact: PandaVee is a blockchain-based access control system powered by the Ergo blockchain
key_facts.speaker: AI

key_facts.fact: Each user's entry rights are verified using a unique token ID, replacing traditional cards or passwords with a secure on-chain identity
key_facts.speaker: AI

key_facts.fact: Every access event is immutably recorded on the blockchain, ensuring full transparency, traceability, and tamper-proof security
key_facts.speaker: AI

key_facts.fact: The system uses Ergonode and ErgoPay to activate Arduino-based hardware and unlock doors
key_facts.speaker: AI

key_facts.fact: Arduino version and Wiegand version will be integrated
key_facts.speaker: AI

key_facts.fact: All transaction IDs can be checked at Ergo Explorer
key_facts.speaker: AI
